price: ߥߟߊ߫ ߒ߬ ߣߊ߬ ߒ߬ ߞߐ߲߬ߞߐ߲߬ ߠߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊߡߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߘߐ߫ ߒ ߧߴߏ ߦߘߵߌ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߲ ߛߋߣߍ߲߫ ߠߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: أَوۡ نُرِيَنَّكَ ٱلَّذِي وَعَدۡنَٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّا عَلَيۡهِم مُّقۡتَدِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: aw nuriyannaka alladhī waʿadnāhum fa-innā ʿalayhim muq'tadirūna
